long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Applications created for Amazon sellers, simple and free.
Applications:
- Quickly marks your viewed store.
- Atomicity saves the store to bookmarks "viewed".
- Creates direct links to the store.
- Shows the full cost of the goods (product price + delivery price)
- Opens the store in a new tab
